entry.def: Someone who is extroverted is very active, lively, and friendly.

example.ex: Some young people who were easy-going and extroverted as children become self-conscious in early adolescence.
example.tran: 一些年轻人孩童时脾气随和、性格活泼，刚进入青春期却变得害羞起来。

means.word_mean: 1. not introspective; examining what is outside yourself
